    • Method Detail

      • getExtenders

        java.util.List getExtenders(java.util.Set hooks)
        Extenders which are hooked on all given hooks.
        Parameters:
        hooks - Set of IBuildExtenderRepository.Hooks
        Returns:
        List of IBuildExtenders
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if hooks is null

      • registerExtender

        void registerExtender(IBuildExtender extender,
                      java.util.Set hooks)
        Register extender.

        If extender is already registered then the given set of hooks replaces the previous one.

        Parameters:
        extender - extender
        hooks - Set of IBuildExtenderRepository.Hooks
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if extender is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if hooks is null

      • unregisterExtender

        void unregisterExtender(IBuildExtender extender)
        Unregister extender.

        Does nothing is extender is not registered.

        Parameters:
        extender - extender
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if extender is null
